Text: Awesome, been waiting for this. But holy crap, it's a lot of bandwidth for a movie that shows so much old vhs-looking footage.

I don't know where else to ask this so I'll do it here. I've been torrenting for a long time. Why do so many of the videos have hard-coded subs? It is rather irritating for me but more than anything, I am just curious. I'm sure there has to be a good reason. Great documentary by the way.
